tool_description: This API is a package of Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) tools that allow to extract relevant information and insights from resumes, job openings and employee feedback.
name: Job and Resume Matching For HR Management Systems
title: Job and Resume Matching For HR Management Systems
tool_name: Job and Resume Matching For HR Management Systems

api_list.name: Language Detector
api_list.description:
## Language Detector

Detect the language of the text

api_list.name: Job Similarity Matcher
api_list.description:
## Job Similarity Matcher

Find the best candidates that match a job opening.

Ideally, you need to process the job opening and all the resumes you want to match with before computing the  similarity matching score. This aims to eliminate the noise and consider only the relevant information for the matching process. This information can be found in the field "summary" in the result of the analysis of job openings and resumes.

The result of the matching process is a list of ranked resumes. Resumes are identified by their "id" (index in the list).  A similarity score is also returned. The lower the score, the more similar are the job opening and the resume.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://job-and-resume-matching-for-hr-management-systems.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1.0/tools/job-resumes-matcher"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "job-and-resume-matching-for-hr-management-systems.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Job Opening Analyser
api_list.description:
## Job Opening Analyser

Analyse job openings in order to extract all relevant information needed to structure the job  or to match candidates.

We extract the following information:

- Title of the job.
- Company name.
- List of the required technical skills.
- List of the required soft skills.
- Required diploma.
- Responsibilities.
- Keywords related to the responsibilities of the job.
- Action verbs related to the responsibilities of the job.
- Query that can be used to search for candidates or similar job openings.
- Summary of the job opening that contains all relevant information to be used to compute the match with candidates or other job openings.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://job-and-resume-matching-for-hr-management-systems.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1.0/tools/job-opening-analyzer"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "job-and-resume-matching-for-hr-management-systems.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Resume Similarity Matcher
api_list.description:
## Resume Similarity Matcher

Find the best job openings that match a candidate.

Ideally, you need to process the resume and all the job openings you want to match with before computing the  similarity matching score. This aims to eliminate the noise and consider only the relevant information for the matching process. This information can be found in the field "summary" in the result of the analysis of job openings and resumes.

The result of the matching process is a list of ranked job openings. Jobs are identified by their "id" (index in the list).  A similarity score is also returned. The lower the score, the more similar are the resume and the job opening.

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "job-and-resume-matching-for-hr-management-systems.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Resume Analyser
api_list.description:
Analyse resumes in order to extract all relevant information needed to structure them or to match candidates with jobs.

We extract the following information:

Name.
Phone number.
Email.
Job title.
Required diploma.
Responsibilities.
Keywords.
Action verbs.
Soft Skills.
Diplomas.
Experience Section.
Education Section.
Query that can be used to search for job or similar candidates.
Summary of the resume that contains all relevant information to be used to compute the match with job openings or other candidates.

api_list.name: Employee Feedback Analyzer
api_list.description:
## Employee Feedback Analyzer

Analyses, employee comments in order to detect the sentiment and the category of the comment.

Employee feedback is of key importance for providing a challenging and caring workplace environment. Collecting and analysing employee feedback allows to identify what needs to be addressed in order to increase employee satisfaction. Unsatisfied employees may ultimately result in high turnover rates and lack of productivity and enthusiasm.

The sentiment will be 'positive', 'negative' or 'neutral'.

The category will be 'culture', 'discrimination and harassment', 'job security and advancement', 'learning training and support', 'location', 'management', 'pay and perks', 'safety', 'work environment', 'work life balance', 'work schedule' or 'other'.

This API can be used to:

- Analyse collected data using employee surveys.
- Analyse online employer reviews.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://job-and-resume-matching-for-hr-management-systems.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1.0/tools/employee-feedback-analyzer"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "job-and-resume-matching-for-hr-management-systems.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
